name: ZRC: Zombie Run City
description:
Think you have what it takes to outmaneuver the zombies and survive the time? ZRC: Zombie City Run is a cute little zombie game where the player (YOU) has to run from the zombies, leading them into traps to gain points. 

Developed during a quick game jam while learning to code, we've released this game to support the dev in their achievement of building a full app release.
